There's something delightfully ironic about a baseball bat signed by @albertmohler. instagr.am/p/JRs71pphl2/  (via @challies)
"Go tell it on the mountain that Jesus Christ is Lord." -@albertmohler #T4G12
"There were words that somehow mysteriously produced belief in us." -@albertmohler #T4G12
"We never want to underestimate the power of the articulate gospel." -@albertmohler #T4G12
"We have to be willing to die for words. We cannot preach, nor teach, nor tell the gospel without words." -@albertmohler #T4G12
"If we are left without words, we cannot fulfill the commission and command of Christ. We cannot articulate the gospel"-@albertmohler #T4G12
"God has chosen in his sovereignty that the whole machinery of the gospel requires words." -@albertmohler #T4G12
We use the only words available for us. When those words represent the gospel they are heard as the very Words of God.-@albertmohler #T4G12
"We're lost without words. The gospel requires words." -@albertmohler #T4G12
"We can and must show the gospel by our actions and deeds but we cannot preach the gospel without words."-@albertmohler #T4G12
"The gospel requires articulation."-@albertmohler #T4G12
"The gospel is not brought near without words...the gospel requires words in order to be received." -@albertmohler #T4G12
"At the cross there is no distinction. Everyone who calls upon the name of the Lord will be saved." -@albertmohler #T4G12
"We are confident in the gospel, not in our ability to save." -@albertmohler #T4G12
"We are not in the soil-management business." -@albertmohler #T4G12
"We are to be promiscuous and indiscriminate in our preaching of the gospel ."-@albertmohler #T4G12
"We don't present the gospel with one hand behind our back." -@albertmohler #T4G12
"Our task is to bring near the Word just as it was brought near to us." -@albertmohler #T4G12
The Word is brought near by the preaching of the gospel. Proximity to the gospel is not the point. Hearing is the point @albertmohler #T4G12
"How did any one of us come to faith in Christ? It is because the Word of Christ was brought near to us!"-@albertmohler #T4G12
"We dare not underestimate the power of the articulated gospel."-@albertmohler #T4G12
"The question remains: are we really preaching and obeying the whole gospel?" -@albertmohler #T4G12
"The haunting fear is that we will fall short. That we will come 'dangerously close' to preaching the Gospel."-@albertmohler #T4G12
"I would not know how to do what God has called me to do without friends." -@albertmohler #t4g
